title: Executive Order 9549-Designation of Mrs. Ruth W. Talley and Mrs. Alice M. Grove to Sign Land Patents
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 450 of the Revised Statutes, as amended (43 U.S.C. 8), the following named employees of the General Land Office, Department of the Interior, are hereby designated to sign my name to land patents:
citation: Harry S Truman, Executive Order 9549-Designation of Mrs. Ruth W. Talley and Mrs. Alice M. Grove to Sign Land Patents Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/278191
